name: CargoCarting
description:
cargo carting is a physics based gravity driven cargo delivery cart game, designed and created for the Free Lives Physics Jam.

The game uses the mouse for the menu and moving objects around, steer the cart with the left and right arrows, click the carts front wheel once you have packed it to begin a run.

You earn stars for the completion of your delivery, these would have been used to unlock cart upgrades (but I didn't get to those)

music added, purchased and comes from: https://chrisgruchacz.itch.io/fantasy-tavern-music-pack
